Ice::

She was fomulating what might happen in her mind.  She was going to 
find it hard not to walk up to her old friends and not tell them who 
she was.  She sighed and closed her mind.  She didn't want Razor Claw 
or Lunarpine to know what she was thinking or feeling. She had to be 
strong and be a leader.  This was something new for her and she was 
trying hard to conceal her fear, which was rising in her throat.

She took the pod down to the open area just outside the base.  She 
looked out the windows and waited for the sign that they could enter 
the base.  She turned to Razor Claw. "Your signature isn't maximal, 
butit's not pred either.  Watch what you say.  Remember, these were 
friends of mine from a long time ago. So they can be trusted. Just 
don't tell them who I am or who you are. You are Razor Claw, my third 
in command and chief security officer. Or would you like another 
title?  One that sounds more impressive maybe?"
